sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Kentucky Blood Center provided the routine donor blood samples collected from allogeneic blood donors for the purpose of donor testing. The donor consent for blood donation includes that the blood sample(s) collected could be used for research purposes. Furthermore, the Institutional Review Board (IRB) designee determined that this project does not require IRB review because the samples utilized in this study were either commercial or de-identified from the Center for Clinical and Translational Science Biorepository (BioBank).

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: All the authors approved the final version of the manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: MC, YL, DW, AS, RFC, GB, and UBRB declare no competing interests. CT, PAL, PC, HGC, and HTW are affiliated with GeneReach USA, Lexington, MA. However, this does not alter our adherence to BMC Infectious Diseases policies on sharing data and materials.
